::: {.callout-warning}
## Summary

We have a love-hate relationship with meetings. This policy helps us keep it on the love side and less on the hate side. In short: synchronous meetings need a purpose; be considerate of each other's time.
:::


## Summary

1. Meetings are an activity - if you are not active, ask why you're there.
2. 
3. Meetings longer than 15 minutes need to have a purpose.
4. Meetings longer than 30 minutes need an agenda.
5. Meeting minutes are taken by everyone present.
